name: Shaman Dojo - Catch 'em spirits!
description:
Welcome to the world of Shaman Dojo!

Catch 'em all but Spirits! A casual game where you can catch spirits or stroll around and talk to the townsfolk. There is a lot of dialogue choices and a lot of time based events depending on the time of day in-game!

Prof. silver's Useful tips:

  1.  USE DEFENSE BOOSTS! Use your specials often! For example, a defense boost makes enemy attacks only 1.
  2. This game has no ending, play leisurely. There's only 6 Spirits in the game after all.
  3. Go in and out your sub menus to refresh the screen to make it nighttime, or simply use your bed and sleep!
  4. Use your Godcard on something rare like a tentacr- oops wrong game.

   

  • WASD/arrow keys - move, enter door
  • K/Z - interact, confirm  (A)
  • J/X - run, cancel (B)
  • Enter  - pause menu (Start)
